name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The public complaint letter released by Zhang Yongzhen's team accuses Shanghai of obstructing the country's COVID-19 tracing mission.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Fact check: This video was released today, but the incident happened earlier. In mid-March 2024, the building in the video had been demolished.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 28, China announced the lifting of the ban on Tesla's driving and parking. 
Previously, there were news reports in many places in China that Tesla was prohibited from entering or parking in government agencies, airports, highways, and other places or on the roads that leaders must pass through for inspection.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 28, Musk traveled to China to meet with Premier Li Qiang.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 26, Tianjin. Investors of Zhongzhi Group defend their rights in front of the Municipal Financial Administration Bureau.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 5, 2020, Zhang Yongzhen's team released a report on the etiology of the epidemic of fever of unknown cause in the South China Seafood Market in Wuhan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"It's not easy to fool the masses now"
On April 29, a video about "the sharp contrast between the police and the public in Chinese and American campuses" triggered mockery from tens of thousands of netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 27, an arson case occurred at the Linlin Dance Hall in Shahekou District, Dalian, Liaoning Province. A 59-year-old man set fire to the security entrance of the dance hall after drinking. He died on the spot and injured three dance hall employees who participated in the rescue.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 28, Meishan, Sichuan. A snack shop owner said that he spent millions of yuan to open a snack shop at the Tianfu Campus of Sichuan Vocational College of Science and Technology, but was forced to close on the third day of opening. The security department forcibly locked and cut off the power supply. It has been nearly three months.
Later, the school said that the reason for not allowing it to operate was that the snack shop's products were too cheap and would affect other businesses.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 29, the Shanghai Public Health Center responded: The construction was closed for safety reasons. In the next step, our hospital will work with relevant units to properly carry out the resettlement work. On the same day, Professor Zhang Zhenyong responded to the statement issued by the Public Health Center, saying that the Public Health Center ordered the team to move out within 2 days last Thursday, but did not give a specific relocation plan. On the same day, the team members expressed their opinions to the hospital, but the hospital had read it but did not reply. On Friday, the hospital staff said that the team could move to other professors' laboratories, but because there were a large number of pathogens in the laboratory, at least the P2 laboratory was required. Professor Zhang Zhenyong also said that the statement mentioned proper resettlement, but it was raining moderately last night, and the Public Health Center did not allow him and his students to take shelter in the laboratory. He has been lying at the door since yesterday and accused the Public Health Center of being inhumane.
It is understood that biosafety laboratories are divided into 4 levels according to the degree of biological hazards handled by the laboratory and the protective measures taken. The P3 laboratory protection laboratory level is suitable for...
fullContent:
4月29日，上海公卫中心回应：因安全原因进行封闭施工，下一步我院将会同有关单位妥善做好安置工作。当天张振永教授回应公卫中心发布的声明称，公卫中心上周四勒令团队2天内搬离，但并给出具体搬迁方案，当天团队成员向院方表达意见，但院方已读不回。周五院方工作人员表示团队可以搬到其他教授的实验室，但因实验室有大量病原体，至少也需要在p2实验室进行。张振永教授还表示声明中提到妥善安置，但昨晚下着中雨，公卫中心不让自己与学生到实验室避雨，从昨天到现在一直在门口躺着，并指责公卫中心毫无人性。
 据了解，根据实验室所处理对象的生物危害程度和采取的防护措施，生物安全实验室分为4个级别。而p3实验室防护实验室级别，适用于处理对人体、动物、植物或环境具有高度危害性，通过直接接触或气溶胶使用人传染上严重的甚至致命疾病，或对动物植物和环境具有高度危害的致病因子。
 对此，有网友质疑，如此仓促的关闭p3实验室，如果没有处理好病原体或临时安置的场所不符合生物安全要求的话，可能会有泄露的放风险。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, all contents in the Weibo account of the laboratory student who has continued to speak out about the incident have been cleared.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 28, the owners of Harbin Kang'an Community reported that after the building was demolished overnight, the government has not yet given a compensation plan. The owners are now homeless. The video was restricted. It is understood that the community was built in 1998 and was identified as a dangerous building in 2022. Only units 4 to 8 of the ten units were evacuated, while units 1, 2, 3, 9, and 10 were still occupied by residents until the cracks appeared. During this period, the owners ran around to protect their rights and went to the Housing and Construction Bureau to find the acceptance report of that year, but were told that it could not be found. Residents questioned how this shoddy project passed the acceptance that year. The resettlement plan given by the government is to rent a house for each household for 1,300 yuan, and the video posted about this matter was also restricted by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 29 (Release) Zhumadian, Henan. The Pingyu Donghuang Yaju real estate project has been unfinished for six years and has not yet been delivered. 
The owners sat in protest outside the government to protect their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 28, in Shenzhen, Guangdong, a group of day-paid workers flocked to a bus recruiting day-paid workers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 28, in Nanchong, Sichuan, a netizen posted a video saying that after the fishery law enforcement officers confiscated his fishing gear and the fish he caught, they did not release them but put them in the trunk of a private car for oxygenation and took them away. Suspecting that the law enforcement officers wanted to take the fish home to eat, the netizen followed them all the way and found that the fish were taken to the refrigerator of the law enforcement unit. The law enforcement officers said it was to preserve evidence.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 29, the waiting hall of Changsha Railway Station was leaking. Many passengers posted related videos and said that a "water curtain cave" appeared in the station. Changsha South Railway Station apologized for this: due to the sudden heavy rainfall in Changsha, the drainage pipes on the ceiling of the waiting room of Changsha South Railway Station could not drain water in time. The emergency treatment was completed at 1:40 pm.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As of tonight, Professor Zhang Zhenyong and his team are still sitting in front of the laboratory to protest.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 28-29, Linyi, Shandong.
Yiliandai collapsed, and the victims gathered at the Linyi City Petition Bureau to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 29 (Released) In Haikou, Hainan, several policemen snatched an electric bike on the street and dragged a begging woman for unknown reasons.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 29, senior high school students from Yuncheng Middle School in Shanxi Province protested because they were dissatisfied with the occupation of their May Day holiday.
On that day, students posted a large number of slogans on the bulletin board to express their dissatisfaction, and pressed their fingerprints, questioning "Kill? Can you kill them all?"
It is reported that in the whole month of April, senior high school students only had 8.5 hours of vacation. The May Day holiday is one and a half days, but students need to do one and a half days of online tests at home.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/Rb5Cw9hZgL

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 27, Tianjin Binhai New Area. Agile Property Management Company owed employees wages, and employees held up banners to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Pingdingshan, Henan, the B area of Ye County's Beautiful Life Home was left unfinished. Owners gathered at the county government and the developer to defend their rights. Some owners were taken away by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 27-Now, Cangzhou, Hebei. Country Garden has been in arrears with real estate agents’ commissions for three years, and the agents are seeking redress at the sales office.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 28, Cangzhou, Hebei. Country Garden’s Yingbin Mansion was left unfinished, and the developer resumed work in a show-off style. On that day, the owners gathered at the Cangzhou Municipal Housing and Urban-Rural Development Bureau to defend their rights and demanded to see the director.
